channel.title: Free vbulletin:
channel.description:
Hi everyone. i am offering free vbulletin for anyone.
What you will need to do is create a mySQL database through your control pannel
Please use this database name,pass and username:
mySQL database user: [i]youruser[/i]_vbforum
mySQL database name: [i]youruser[/i]_vbulletin
mySQL password: 2223
Please have that as the database user and pass. It will not work if it is not that. Where it says [i]youruser[/i] that is your cpanel or control pannel username.
If you need help, please post or email me at ikick@codexonline.info
I will then upload it to this post or rapidshare. I will also email it to you if you want.
Another alturnative, i could email the source and you could figure it out your self :O
Thanks
ikick

item.description:
